CustomField.formula:
IF(OR (ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Closed - Expired'),ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Routed to Channel')),'[No Action Available]',IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Requires Follow-Up'), OR (ISPICKVAL(Accept_Reject_Status__c, ''), ISPICKVAL(Accept_Reject_Status__c, 'Reassigned By Sales'))) , HYPERLINK(Id & '/e?nooverride=1&retURL=/' & Id & '&00NA0000000b8ZI=Accepted By Sales', IMAGE("resource/1257839368000/MA_Accept", 'Accept'), '_parent') & ' ' & HYPERLINK(Id & '/e?nooverride=1&retURL=/' & Id & '&00NA0000000b8ZI=Rejected By Sales&00NA0000000b8Zc=Rejected - Completed Follow-Up', IMAGE("resource/1257839368000/MA_Reject", 'Reject'), '_parent') & ' ' & HYPERLINK('/apex/RelationshipLeadAccPlayTM?Id='+Id+'&AccId='+ Account__r.Id+'&OwnerId='+ Account_Play_Owner__c , IMAGE("resource/1266470716000/MA_Reassign", "Reassign") , "_parent"),
IF( AND(OR(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Attempted to Contact - Awaiting Response'),ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Future Follow-Up')),NOT( ISPICKVAL( Lead_Quality__c , 'Qualified') ),NOT( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Closed - Expired') )) , HYPERLINK(Id & '/e?nooverride=1&retURL=/' & Id, IMAGE("resource/1257839368000/MA_UpdateRecord", 'Update Record'), '_parent'),
IF(AND( ISPICKVAL(Lead_Quality__c, 'Qualified'), OR(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity_Status__c,'New Opportunity'), ISPICKVAL(Opportunity_Status__c,'Existing Opportunity'),ISPICKVAL(Opportunity_Status__c,'Run Rate Opportunity')), Opportunity__c=null ), HYPERLINK('006/e?retURL=/' & Id & '&RecordType=012300000004zf2&00NA0000000bC8S=' & Id&'&opp4='& Account__r.Name &'&opp4_lkid=' & Account__r.Id&'&opp17='& Campaign__r.Name&'&00NA0000000b8l9=1&opp5=Deal/Bid - Direct&opp11=Plan - 1%25&nooverride=1' , IMAGE("resource/1257839368000/MA_NewOpptys", 'New Opportunity'),'_parent') & ' ' & HYPERLINK('apex/MarketingExistingOppAssn?retURL=%2F' & Id & '&accountPlayId=' & Id & '&accid=' & Account__r.Id & '&campaignid=' & Campaign__c , IMAGE("resource/1257839368000/MA_ExistingOpptys", 'Existing Opportunity'),'_parent') ,
'[No Action Available]'))))
CustomField.label: Actions Available
